General_Description: '''Starving the Beast''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens|Athenians]] are stockpiling resources in crates - an easy enough target for crippling the Athenian [[Peloponnesian War|war effort]]." – [[Nation Leader|Leader]] of (region)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and destroyed Athenian supplies in the region, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Destroy the Supplies]], [[No Future for the Hungry]], and [[Starve the Enemy]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
